name: TabletPCR Troubleshooter
short_description:
NOTE 04/15/2013:
The TabletPCR Troubleshooter prerelease download has been temporarily taken down until I can verify compliance with FDA guidelines. The application is is still in development.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

This project aims to automate common troubleshooting of the ZOLL TabletPCR application including network communication, system security and permissions, database maintenance and eDistribution Download failure, version compatibility and common misconfiguration issues.
For release notes see the TablePCR Troubleshooterwiki and please direct all issues and questions to the Tickets section.
summary: Troubleshooter for TabletPCR & the ZOLL ePCR Suite of Applications
